title: (x) Nestea logo - based on Friz Quadrata {Stephen}
content:
Is anybody able to tell me which font is being used for the Nestea logo?  
It's probably customized, so anything similar should do fine as well!  
Thanks!

Attached: two versions of the logo

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [nestea\_logo\_250.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130127025717/http:/typophile.com/files/nestea_logo_250.jpg) | 4.35 KB |
| [logo\_np.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130127025717/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_np.jpg) | 459.21 KB |
author: Namme

comments.content: Customized for sure. Will look for like fonts.
'Peach' is [Textile from Apple](http://web.archive.org/web/20130127025717/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/apple/textile/) if you were at all wondering about that.

Nice one! I wasn't really looking for this one but I think it will come to some use anyway.  
I am looking forward to any suggestion for the Nestea-typeface.

This may have began life as [Friz Quadrata](http://web.archive.org/web/20130127025717/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=M.123974.0.0&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=NESTEA&sampleSize=74). That 'N' gives it away.
They could've flipped the A also.
yeah, I thought of friz too but it's been wildly customized.
